group_1.narration: Kako Natsume joined us in our@search for the picture book.

group_1.textLeft: All right, so...
I'll try calling another old bookstore. My@father knows the owner.
I can check if they have that book in their@stock.

group_1.textRight: That's really kind of you. Thanks!

group_1.textLeft: Just give me a little time. An hour or so@should do it.
So what do we do while we wait?
We could read the rest of that other book...

group_1.textRight: Arisa!
You can't slack off while Kako is working@hard by herself!

group_1.textLeft: I was only kidding.

group_1.textRight: The two of us can try looking around the@stores nearby.
It doesn't feel right to just sit around,@so we'll be back in an hour.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it's fine. Don't worry about it.

group_1.textRight: No, really! We're very thankful for this.
Let's go, Arisa.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, all right.

group_1.textCenter: See you in an hour, then!
Why are you walking so fast?

group_1.textLeft: There's something I need to say!
How could you make such a selfish suggestion@back there?!

group_1.textRight: I said I was kidding.

group_1.textLeft: There's a place and a time to kid around!
This was neither! You never pay attention@to the situation!
Plus you just asked Kako to help without a@second of consideration.
You have to show respect for other people@and watch what you say!

group_1.textRight: Urgh! I get it already!

group_1.textLeft: Arisa!

group_1.textRight: Nag, nag, nag! Do you ever stop?
I've got something to say too, you know.
If you REALLY want to find that book, you@should prove it by trying everything!
What's wrong with accepting help right off@the bat when people offer it?!

group_1.textLeft: That's just...!

group_1.textRight: You get too uptight about the little stuff.
And you know what, I think about the things@I say and do, just like you!
I was thinking about how you wanted to find@that picture book!

group_1.textLeft: Arisa...

group_1.textRight: I'm going back.
I'm gonna read the rest of that other book@while I wait for Kako to finish up.

group_1.textLeft: Fine.
I'll search out here.

group_1.textRight: Fine...
Later.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...
(Arisa...)
